body_html:
it works, but it does not solve the problem.
the issue is that removing pillow ("conda uninstall -y pillow") removes also torchvision.
If I install torchvision again it will install and use pillow 4.1.0 even if I installed pillow==4.1.1 with pip
body_text:
it works, but it does not solve the problem.
the issue is that removing pillow ("conda uninstall -y pillow") removes also torchvision.
If I install torchvision again it will install and use pillow 4.1.0 even if I installed pillow==4.1.1 with pip
body:
it works, but it does not solve the problem.
the issue is that removing pillow ("conda uninstall -y pillow") removes also torchvision.
If I install torchvision again it will install and use pillow 4.1.0 even if I installed pillow==4.1.1 with pip
